summary: This is an email chain from March 9, 2017, among attorneys representing victims in the Epstein case. They discuss an upcoming hearing, potential postponement, and trial date confirmation for May 15, 2017. The emails show coordination between legal teams handling related cases against Jeffrey Epstein and others.
